extendedInfo.description: Big Night Clock is a small application that displays a large clock on your deviceâs screen. What makes it different from all others, is the fact that it exploits the ability of the human brain to reconstruct the missing parts of the geometrical figures, in this case the characters that make up the hours and minutes. So even expanding the numbers on the clock as much as to exceed the physical edge of the device, youâll still be able to figure out the right time, with the advantage of being visible from far away. A great help for those wearing glasses during the day, but donât wear them while theyâre in bed.It is equipped with a number of customizable settings that combine ease of use and completeness.You can, directly from the main screen:- Move the clockâs digits by swiping.- Pinch to zoom in/out.- Rotate it by rotating two fingers on screen.Other settings are available by pressing your deviceâs "menu" button and selecting the âCustomize current presetâ option or by double tapping the screen.From here you can change:- Selection and name of the active preset. There are three configurable presets. They appear as menu shortcuts.- Screen brightness.- Font Color.- Background color.- The font to use.- Display style.- Borderâs thickness.- Borderâs color.- Clockâs position.The "Global settings" menu item is where you can:- Lock the screen, so you do not accidentally move the clock.- Set the time format AM/PM or 24h.- Keep the screen on while the phone is charging.- Keep the screen on while the phone is running on battery.- Turn off the power when the battery is low.- Use the "Anti burn in" to avoid this phenomenon. (*)From the "Other" menu, you can select:- About: some information about the application and its authors.- Set Alarm: a shortcut for setting the alarm on your device. (**)- Online Help: open the online help. (***)- Online FAQ: open the online Frequently Asked Questions. (***)- Online ChangeLog: open the online description of the latest updates. (***)- Report a Bug: If you find something wrong that is not described in the online pages, please let us know by sending us an email.(*) See your deviceâs instructions to check if itâs screen is more or less sensitive to burn-in (image retention).(**) Not supported by some devices.(***) Requires an active internet connection.

reviews.title: Absolutely Excellent!
reviews.comment: I\'m beginning to sound like a fanboy because of your awesome products. But can I just ask you to make a countdown/timer app just like this - oversized?
reviews.author: Jeffrey Ocaya

reviews.title: absolutely brilliant
reviews.comment: After I started using this app on my docked tablet, I gave my normal clock radio away. Even if I forget to plug the dock into the charger, it doesn\'t use much of the battery! I set it to a black background with a dark blue font (of course with anti-burn on) and sleep like a baby although my tablet\'s 10.1\" screen is on less than a meter from my face! In future updates an analogue / digital combination would be nice though, but that won\'t stop me from giving you 5 stars! Well done!!
reviews.author: Stephan Marais

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Does everything i need and doesn\'t light up the room  like blackpool Tower! And free? Wow.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: This app would be better if you could remove the leading zero when in 12 hour mode. It confuses my when I\'m half awake in the morning. Otherwise it is a great (and simple) clock.
reviews.author: Mark Peterson

reviews.title: Sweeeet!
reviews.comment: It does wat it says. Really good wen you just woke up and wana snooze. That large time display its easy to find. Wold b nice if the screen flashes wen the alarm goes off but im still going to keep it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good

reviews.title: Like it!
reviews.comment: I hope it doesn\'t burn my screen though, only used it one night so far, but love the ability to customize the display...looks pretty

reviews.comment: Great ! simple ! & wosks perfectly ! My (night ;) ) life goes to an next level :))  Really good job guys  -merci !
